code: const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL;export const getData=async endpoint=>{try{const res=await fetch(`${API_URL}/${endpoint}`,{headers:{'Accept':'application/json','Content-Type':'application/json'}});if(!res.ok){const text=await res.text();throw new Error(text);}return await res.json();}catch(err){throw new Error(err.message);}};
